GR14satvtanu:1: ya eko bahudhā kṛṣṇaḥ sṛṣṭyādau bahudheyate /
GR14satvtanu:2: tam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmi paramānandavigraham // SatvT_1.1
GR14satvtanu:7: yadarthaṃ yatsvarūpaṃ ca yadyat kāle yathā rataḥ /

GR14satvtanu:10: prathamaṃ tattvato brūhi tvaṃ parāparavittamaḥ // SatvT_1.5
GR14satvtanu:15: kathane naiva paśyāmi pāraṃ varṣaśatair api /
GR14satvtanu:16: tathāpi sāram uddhṛtya tantrarūpeṇa nārada // SatvT_1.7
GR14satvtanu:20: yadāsīd ekam avyaktaṃ nityaṃ cidrūpam avyayam // SatvT_1.9

GR14satvtanu:23: dviprakāram abhūt satyaṃ sattābhūtvā svayaṃ svayam /
GR14satvtanu:24: tac cicchaktisvarūpeṇa prakṛtiḥ puruṣo mahān // SatvT_1.11
GR14satvtanu:28: yaḥ kālas taṃ vadanty eke hareś ceṣṭāṃ duranvayām // SatvT_1.13
GR14satvtanu:32: bhāvānāṃ pariṇāmo hi yato bhavati sarvadā // SatvT_1.15
GR14satvtanu:34: ukto 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ sākṣād īśvaro bhagavattanuḥ // SatvT_1.16
GR14satvtanu:38: tasmāj jāto hy ahaṃkāras trividho daivanoditāt // SatvT_1.18
GR14satvtanu:39: vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś ceti yaṃ viduḥ /
GR14satvtanu:44: tvagrasajñā śrutiś cakṣur ghrāṇaṃ buddhiś ca tanmayāḥ // SatvT_1.21
GR14satvtanu:46: tāmasāt pañcabhūtāni tanmātrāṇi ca bhāgaśaḥ // SatvT_1.22
GR14satvtanu:47: prathamaṃ tāmasāj jajñe śabdas tasmād abhūn nabhaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:48: śabdarūpāt tu nabhasaḥ sparśas tasmād abhūn marut // SatvT_1.23
GR14satvtanu:49: maruto 'bhūt tatas tejas tejaso rūpam uttamam /
GR14satvtanu:50: rūpamātrād raso jajñe tasmād āpo 'bhavan śucīḥ // SatvT_1.24
GR14satvtanu:51: adbhyo jāto gandhaguṇo gandhād bhūmir ajāyata /
GR14satvtanu:54: śabdasya prakṛter eva saṃdṛśyante yato budhaiḥ // SatvT_1.26
GR14satvtanu:56: ākāśe śabdamātraṃ syād vāyau sparśaḥ saśabdakaḥ // SatvT_1.27
GR14satvtanu:57: rūpaṃ tejasi śabdaś ca sparśaś caiva jale tathā /
GR14satvtanu:58: rasaśabdasparśarūpaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sarvam eva hi // SatvT_1.28
GR14satvtanu:60: dṛśyate tv adhikas tatra guṇo yāvati kaś ca ha // SatvT_1.29
GR14satvtanu:66: daśottarādhikair etaiḥ saptabhir bahir āvṛtam // SatvT_1.32
GR14satvtanu:67: tam āhuḥ puruṣasyaiva gehaṃ yatrāviśat svayam /
GR14satvtanu:70: ayanaṃ tasya yad abhūt tasmān nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // SatvT_1.34
GR14satvtanu:72: ataḥ puruṣanāmānam avāpa puruṣaḥ paraḥ // SatvT_1.35
GR14satvtanu:74: nārāyaṇena rūpeṇa virajam aviśat svayam // SatvT_1.36
GR14satvtanu:75: tadā cetanam āpādya cirād vigraha utthitaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:77: yasmin carācaraṃ bhūtaṃ sraṣṭā brahmāhares tanūḥ /
GR14satvtanu:78: tatra lokamayaṃ yāvat taṃ virājaṃ vido viduḥ // SatvT_1.38
GR14satvtanu:84: viṣṇuḥ sattvaguṇādhīśaḥ sthitau sthāpayituṃ jagat // SatvT_1.41
GR14satvtanu:86: ete viṣṇor guṇamayā avatārāḥ kriyākṛtāḥ // SatvT_1.42
GR14satvtanu:87: eṣām aṃśāvatārān me nibodha gadato mama /
GR14satvtanu:88: brahmaṇo 'ṃśena samabhūn marīcir atrir aṅgirāḥ // SatvT_1.43
GR14satvtanu:89: pulastyaḥ pulahaś caiva kratur dakṣo dvijottama /
GR14satvtanu:90: bhṛgur vasiṣṭho 'tharvā ca kardamādyāḥ prajeśvarāḥ // SatvT_1.44
GR14satvtanu:91: eṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca prapautrāś ca mahaujasaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:93: viṣṇor aṃśena samabhūd dharmo yajño bṛhattrivṛt /
GR14satvtanu:95: eṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca tathendrādyāś ca devatāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:96: viṣṇvaṃśayuktā lokānāṃ pālakāḥ kathitā mayā // SatvT_1.47
GR14satvtanu:98: sarpāś ca śataśo jātā ye ca hiṃsrāḥ svabhāvataḥ // SatvT_1.48
GR14satvtanu:101: atha te sampravakṣyāmi līlādehān hareḥ pṛthak /
GR14satvtanu:103: ya īśa eko bhagavān ananto brahmasvarūpī puruṣo 'dhiyajñaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:104: pātuṃ punar viśvam asau svakāryaṃ bheje tanūs taṃ praṇamāmi kṛṣṇam //
GR14satvtanu:105: iti śrīsātvatatantre śivanāradasaṃvāde prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ // SatvT_1.52
GR14satvtanu:107: sākṣād babhūva bhagavān paripātum īśo vedān yugādisamaye hayaśīrṣanāmā /
GR14satvtanu:108: hatvā suretaravarau madhukaiṭabhākhyau nastaś cakāra viśrutīḥ śrutibhir vimṛgyaḥ // SatvT_2.1
GR14satvtanu:109: lokān nivṛttiparatāṃ pracikīrṣur ādau bhūtvā catuḥsanatayā bhagavān vimuktyai /
GR14satvtanu:110: provāca yogam amalaṃ viśadāśayebhyo bhogān viraktiparatāṃ svayam ācacāra // SatvT_2.2
GR14satvtanu:111: deveṣu nāradatanur bhagavān viśuddhaṃ naiṣkarmyayogam avahat khalu pāñcarātram /
GR14satvtanu:112: dharmaṃ tathā bhagavatā kathitaṃ viśeṣaśiṣyeṣv asau paramanirvṛtim ādadhānam // SatvT_2.3
GR14satvtanu:113: ādau dadhāra dharaṇīdharaṇāya dhātuḥ svāyambhuvoktiparipālakakāla eva /
GR14satvtanu:115: bhūmer adho dharaṇimaṇḍalam aprameyaḥ śeṣākhya āsa jagataḥ sthitaye nitāntam /
GR14satvtanu:116: yasmin kalārpitam idaṃ likhivac cakāsti nāgādhipair munigaṇaiḥ parisevitāṅghriḥ // SatvT_2.5
GR14satvtanu:117: tasmād adhaḥ kamaṭha āsa viśālarūpī brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍaparivistṛtādivyakāyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:118: śeṣo 'pi yatra paribhāti sutantutulyo yaṃ cāryamā pitṛpatiḥ samupāsate vai // SatvT_2.6
GR14satvtanu:119: dṛṣṭvā dṛśārdhavayasāpi vihāya mātur dehaṃ dhruvaṃ madhuvane tapasābhitaptam /
GR14satvtanu:120: bhūtvā kṛpāmayavapur bhagavān svalokaṃ prādāt stuvanti yatayo munayo 'pi
GR14satvtanu:122: ālokya kardamatapo bhagavān vibhūtyai saṃśuddhadivyavapuṣāvirabhūt saśuklaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:123: tasmā adād varamajātmajaputrarūpam ānandabindupayasā ca cakāra tīrtham //
GR14satvtanu:124: yajñe sa eva rucinā manuputriputra āhūtisūtir asurāraṇivahnikalpaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:125: trailokyagopanavidhau suranātha īśa nāmnā suyajña iti viśrutakīrtir āśiḥ // SatvT_2.9
GR14satvtanu:126: siddheśvaraś ca samabhūt kapilākhya īśaḥ śrīdevahūtitanayo vitatāna tasyai /
GR14satvtanu:127: yogaṃ svaśaktisahitaṃ cidacidvibhāgaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ tathā svabhimukheṣu jagāda śuddham // SatvT_2.10
GR14satvtanu:128: yogeśvaro 'tritanayo bhagavān ananto dattākhya āsa samatāvavadat svacaryām
GR14satvtanu:129: prahlādahaihayayaduṣv aparāyaṇeṣu śiṣyeṣu śikṣitakathāṃ kathayan gurubhyaḥ
GR14satvtanu:130: nārāyaṇo nara ṛṣipravarāvabhūtāṃ dharmasya dakṣaduhitary adhimūrtipatnyām
GR14satvtanu:132: nābher abhūd ṛṣabhasaṃjñasadāptakāmo yogeśvaraḥ sutaśatair avadat prajābhyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:133: dharmaṃ tataḥ paramayogijanāvacaryāṃ naiṣkarmyalakṣaṇaparāṃ svayam ācacāra
GR14satvtanu:134: dhātrantike susanakādibhir īryamāṇe cetoguṇān vigalituṃ bhagavān sa haṃsaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:135: provāca tattvam amalaṃ sadayārdracittā yasmād guṇāguṇavibhāgam abhūn munīnām // SatvT_2.14
GR14satvtanu:136: vene mṛte dvijajanair anu bāhuyugmaṃ saṃmathyamānasamaye pṛthurūpa āsīt /
GR14satvtanu:137: lokakṣudhāṃ praśamayan pṛthivīṃ dudoha sarvāṇi bhūtikaraṇāni ca sarvabhūtyai // SatvT_2.15
GR14satvtanu:138: dakṣasya yajñavihite śivaśaktihetoḥ prāptājyabhāmam adhikaṃ bhṛguṇābhidattam /

GR14satvtanu:142: saṃvatsarasya tanayaḥ sa ha yāminīnām ālokanādivividhaṃ mudam ācikīrṣuḥ /
GR14satvtanu:143: śrīkāmadevavapuṣā hy avatīrya devo devyomayā madanakelibhir ārarāma //
GR14satvtanu:144: prācīnabarhitanayāṃs tapasā sutaptān dṛṣṭvā svaśāntavapuṣāvirabhūd anantaḥ

GR14satvtanu:146: svārociṣe tuṣitayā dvijavedaśīrṣāj jāto vibhuḥ sakaladharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:147: yad brahmacaryāniyamān ṛṣayo 'py aśikṣan sākṣāj jagadgurutayāvacacāra

GR14satvtanu:151: turye 'ntare sarasi vāraṇarājarājaṃ grāheṇa tīvrabalinā parikarṣayantam /

GR14satvtanu:153: vaikuṇṭha āsa bhagavān dvijavarya mudrā devyā mayā tadanurūpajayābhidhānaḥ /

GR14satvtanu:157: vairājavipratanayo 'jitasaṃjña īśo devāsurair amathayat sahasā payodhim //
GR14satvtanu:158: devāsure jalanidher mathanād viṣaṣṇe hastāc cyute girivare sahasārdracittaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:159: bhūtvā tu kūrmavapur adbhutam uddadhāra mene ca parvatavivartanagātrakaṇḍūm // SatvT_2.25
GR14satvtanu:160: dugdhāmbudhāv ururujāṃ pracikīrṣur īśa ādāya pūrṇakalaśaṃ sudhayā nitāntam /
GR14satvtanu:161: āyurvidhānanigamaṃ khalu yajñabhoktā dhanvantariḥ samabhavad bhagavān narāṇām // SatvT_2.26

GR14satvtanu:163: mohiny abhūt sa bhagavān asurāsurāṇāṃ mohāya tāpaviramāya sadāptakāmaḥ //
GR14satvtanu:164: satyavratāya janatarpaṇataḥ svarūpaṃ mātsyaṃ mahākaruṇayā pravitatya sadyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:165: kalpārṇave 'py avadad acyuta ātmatattvaṃ bhūrūpanāvivasate viharan dvijebhyaḥ // SatvT_2.28

GR14satvtanu:167: dhṛtvāsurendram asurendraviśālatīvravakṣaḥsthalaṃ sthalam ivāgranakhair dadāra // SatvT_2.29
GR14satvtanu:168: yasmin prapaśyati baliḥ sagaṇaṃ trilokaṃ tenāpi vāmanatanuṃ bhagavān gṛhītvā /
GR14satvtanu:169: saṃyācya sammitapadatritayaṃ baleḥ svaṃ kṛtvā triviṣṭapam adād aditeḥ sutebhyaḥ // SatvT_2.30
GR14satvtanu:170: bhaktān ahaṃ samanuvarta iti svavācaṃ sākṣāt prakartum iva bhūvivare praviṣṭaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:171: vairocaner gṛham arakṣayad aprameyo nāmnā gadādhara iti kṣapayan dayāvān
GR14satvtanu:172: bhūtvā tu bhārgavakule nijatātanāśād rāmo mahāparaśukaṃ parigṛhya tīkṣṇam /
GR14satvtanu:173: kṣatraṃ nivārya kṣititalaṃ parihṛtya bhūyo dattvā dvijāya hy avasat sa mahendrapṛṣṭhe // SatvT_2.32
GR14satvtanu:175: devārināśanavidhau kuśikānvayena nīto maheśadhanur ājagavaṃ babhañja //
GR14satvtanu:176: jñātvā tato bhṛgukulodbhavadhīravīraṃ rāmaṃ sugaurarucirāṃ pariṇīya sītām
GR14satvtanu:177: gatvā gṛhān gṛhapateḥ pitur āptajāyāvācaṃ niśamya vanavāsam agāt sabhāryaḥ
GR14satvtanu:180: hatvā krūrasurendravairihariṇaṃ mārīcasaṃjñaṃ tato laṅkeśāhṛtasītayā khalu punaḥ prāpto dṛśām īdṛśām // SatvT_2.35
GR14satvtanu:181: candraṃ caṇḍakaraṃ pracaṇḍapavanaṃ mene sumandānilaṃ mālāṃ mālatimallikāṃ śucikalāṃ gītaṃ sphuliṅgāyitam /
GR14satvtanu:182: ity evaṃ vanitāparāyaṇanaraṃ hāsyann ivālokayan ṛkṣaṃ manmathasāyakāhṛtamano reme priyāśaṅkayā gatvā vānararājavālinamahāmitreṇa setuṃ tato baddhvā vāridhim ātarat taratamaṃ sākaṃ plavaṃgair mudā /
GR14satvtanu:183: chittvā rākṣasayakṣalakṣam amalā sītā saputrānujaṃ laṅkeśaṃ jvaladagninā bhagavatā cāptā punaḥ sā purī // SatvT_2.37
GR14satvtanu:185: udriktabhaktinamitān anayat svanāthān sarvān vanādhivasataḥ svapadaṃ suśāntam // SatvT_2.38
GR14satvtanu:186: tasyānujo bharatasaṃjña udārabuddhī rāmājñayā nijagṛhe nivasann api śrīm /
GR14satvtanu:187: tyaktvā vanasthavratavān abhavat tato vai gandharvakoṭimathanaṃ viharaṃś cakāra // SatvT_2.39
GR14satvtanu:188: śrīlakṣmaṇas tadavaro vanam etya rāmaṃ sītāṃ niṣecya bahukaṣṭa āsīt /
GR14satvtanu:189: bāhye 'pi cāsya vacasā vanam etya dehaṃ saṃtyajya tatpadam agād arisainyavahniḥ // SatvT_2.40
GR14satvtanu:190: śatrughnasaṃjña uruvikramaśuddhabuddhiḥ śauryeṇa darpadalano dviṣatāṃ dayāluḥ /
GR14satvtanu:192: mārkaṇḍanāmamunaye bhuvanāni deṣṭuṃ māyālaye tanutare jaṭhare mukundaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:194: vṛtrasya ghoravapuṣā paritāpitānāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāya bhagavān yudhi nirjarāṇām
GR14satvtanu:195: ādyo hy abhūd garuḍakiṃnaragītakīrtis teṣāṃ suduḥkhabhayaśokavināśaśīlaḥ
GR14satvtanu:196: aṅguṣṭhaparvasumitān śramaṇān dvijāgryān dṛṣṭvā tu goṣpadapayogatasarvadehān /
GR14satvtanu:197: brahmaṇya indrahasitān samidaṃśuhastān gurvarcanāya kṛpayāvad amūn prapannān // SatvT_2.44
GR14satvtanu:198: duṣyantabījam adhigamya śakuntalāyāṃ jāto hy ajo 'pi bhagavān adhiyajñakart /
GR14satvtanu:199: vismāpayan bahunṛpān bahuvājimedhān sākṣād iyāja bahu dānam adād ameyaḥ //
GR14satvtanu:200: sarvān janān kaliyuge balabuddhihīnān dṛṣṭvā kṛpāparavaśo vasuvīryajāyām /
GR14satvtanu:201: jātaḥ parāśarasakāśata ādidevo vedān samāhitatayā vibhajiṣyati sma //
GR14satvtanu:202: vṛṣṇeḥ kule tu bhagavān baladevanāmā yasmād balān atibalān adalat surārīn
GR14satvtanu:203: yal lāṅgalāgrakalanāt kururājadhānī dhāneva dhāmasahitā calitātibhītā //
GR14satvtanu:204: bhūmer janasya nijapādaparāyaṇasya vṛṣṇer ajo 'pi bhagavān sukham ādadhānaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:205: jāto bhaviṣyati yaśo vipulaṃ prakartuṃ śrīkṛṣṇa ity abhihito 'khilaśaktipūrṇaḥ // SatvT_2.48
GR14satvtanu:206: jāto nijena vapuṣā vasudevagehe gatvā tu gokulam atho viharan vinodaiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:209: dhṛtvocchilīndhram iva sapta dināni vāmahaste pragṛhya suranāthamadaṃ pramārṣṭā // SatvT_2.50
GR14satvtanu:210: dhātrā yadā sapaśugopaśiśau praṇīte buddher bhramo halabhṛto 'bhavad
GR14satvtanu:212: tat saṃharan sapaśupālakulasvarūpaṃ kṛtvā vidhiṃ vividhamohamalāt sa dhartā // SatvT_2.51
GR14satvtanu:215: kaṃsasya raṅgasadanaṃ sabale praṇīte svāphalkinā bhavadhanus tarasā vibhajya /
GR14satvtanu:216: cāṇūraśūraśamanaṃ sahakaṃsamājau kartā dvipaṃ kuvalayaṃ sahasā nihatya //
GR14satvtanu:217: sāṃdīpanaṃ mṛtasutaṃ gurudakṣiṇārthī dattvā jarāsutabalaṃ yavanaṃ ca hatvā /
GR14satvtanu:218: śrīrukmiṇīprabhṛtidāraśataṃ vivāhya tābhyaḥ sutān daśadaśānu janiṣyati sma
GR14satvtanu:219: bhaumaṃ nihatya sagaṇaṃ divi devamātur dātuṃ tadīyamaṇikuṇḍalam ādidevaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:220: gatvā surendratarurājavaraṃ priyāyāḥ prītau samuddharaṇato ditijān sa jetā // SatvT_2.55
GR14satvtanu:221: bāṇāsurasya samare mama vīryanāśāl labdhāmaratvam adhikaṃ yudhi bhūpabandhūn /
GR14satvtanu:222: jitvā yudhiṣṭhiranṛpakratunā vivāhabījaṃ nipātya gurubhārataraṃ prahartā
GR14satvtanu:223: loke pradarśya sutarāṃ dvijadevapūjāṃ svasyāpy apārakaruṇāṃ nijasevakebhyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:224: trātvā parīkṣitanṛpaṃ paramāstradagdhaṃ pārthāya bhūtim avalokayitā dvijārthe // SatvT_2.57
GR14satvtanu:225: kāmena snehabhayarāgakuṭubasaṃdhe yasmin mano nivasataḥ śamalaṃ nirasya /
GR14satvtanu:226: dātā svarūpam amalaṃ pariśuddhabhāvaḥ sākṣāt svarūpaniratasya ca kiṃ nu vakṣye // SatvT_2.58
GR14satvtanu:227: yat pādapaṅkajaparāgaparāyaṇānām agre cakāsti na ca muktisukhaṃ nitāntam /
GR14satvtanu:228: kiṃ vānyadarpitabhayaṃ khalu kālavegaiḥ sākṣān mahāsukhasamudragatāntarāṇām // SatvT_2.59
GR14satvtanu:229: gaṅgāditīrthatapahomavratādikebhyaḥ kīrtiṃ svakīyam adhikāṃ samudīrya loke
GR14satvtanu:230: atyunnataṃ dvijakulaṃ dvijaśāpavyājād dhatvā svalokam amalaṃ tanunābhigantā // SatvT_2.60
GR14satvtanu:231: tasmād bhaviṣyati sutaḥ sukhado janānāṃ pradyumnasaṃjña urugāyaguṇānurūpaḥ
GR14satvtanu:232: kartā mudaṃ muditavaktrasucārugātraiḥ pātrair ivāmṛtapayo manujān pracchan
GR14satvtanu:234: yasmād uṣāharaṇato bhujavīryanāśād bāṇo bhaviṣyati śivānugaśāntadehaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:235: vyāsād bhaviṣyati [... au2 ṇeichenjh] bhagavān araṇyāṃ yogī janān prati gadiṣyati vedasāram śrīmatsuśāntam amalaṃ bhagavatpraṇītaṃ yac chraddhayā kalijanā api yānti śāntim /
GR14satvtanu:236: buddhāvatāram adhigamya kalāvalakṣair veṣair mater ativimohakaraṃ pralobham // SatvT_2.64
GR14satvtanu:237: pākhaṇḍaśāstram adhikalpya suradviṣāṇāṃ kartā jinasya tanayo bhagavān gayāyām /
GR14satvtanu:238: pākhaṇḍaśāstrabahule nijavedamārge naṣṭe dvijātibhir asatpathi vartamāne
GR14satvtanu:240: sākṣād bhaviṣyati sarasvatisaṃjñitāyāṃ śrīsārvabhauma iti vedagupo dvijāgryāt // SatvT_2.66
GR14satvtanu:241: kṛtvā puraṃdaraśriyaṃ balaye 'tidāsyan goptāṣṭame manuyuge viditānubhāvaḥ
GR14satvtanu:242: āyuḥ karo navamanoḥ samaye janānāṃ nītiṃ vidhātum amarārivināśanāya //
GR14satvtanu:243: goptā bhaviṣyati jagajjanadhārayāsau bhūtvā śrutendrasahito bhagavān apāraḥ /
GR14satvtanu:244: bhūtvā viśūcisadane dvijarājaśambhoḥ sāhityakarmaparavān daśame 'ntare saḥ
GR14satvtanu:245: pātāmarān [... au3 ṇeichenjh] viśvak [... au1 ṇeichenjh] senasaṃjño yat sainyapūgasamarād amarārināśaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:248: hatvāsurān surapatau vidhṛter apatye dātā tṛtīyabhavanaṃ bhagavān svayambhūḥ /
GR14satvtanu:249: jāto dviṣaṇmanuyuge yugapālanāya viprāt svaśaktimahasaḥ sunṛtākhyato vai
GR14satvtanu:250: khyāto bhaviṣyati tato bhagavān svadhāmā yasmāj janā jagati saukhyam apāram āpuḥ /
GR14satvtanu:251: bhāvye trayodaśayuge bhavitādidevaḥ śrīdevahotratanayo bhagavān bṛhatyām
GR14satvtanu:252: yogeśvaro divi divaspatiśakramitro yogād ameyavapuṣā sa vitānatulyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:255: ete mayā bhagavataḥ kathitā dvijāte śuddhāvatāranicayā jagato hitārthāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:258: tam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmi kṛṣṇaṃ brahmāṇḍanāyakam // SatvT_2.74
GR14satvtanu:263: katham aṃśakalābhāga etad varṇaya no vibho // SatvT_3.2
GR14satvtanu:265: satyam uktaṃ tvayā brahman kṛṣṇasya jagadātmanaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:266: avatāreṣu sarveṣu bhedād aṃśakalāḥ svataḥ // SatvT_3.3
GR14satvtanu:268: avikārād acyutāc ca nirbhedād brahmarūpiṇaḥ // SatvT_3.4
GR14satvtanu:272: tathāpi kāryataḥ kecid dṛśyante na hi sarvataḥ // SatvT_3.6
GR14satvtanu:273: aiśvaryajñānadharmāś ca vairāgyaṃ śrīr yaśas tathā /
GR14satvtanu:274: eṣāṃ saṃdarśanāt sākṣāt pūrṇo vidvadbhir ucyate // SatvT_3.7
GR14satvtanu:277: aṃśas turīyo bhāgaḥ syāt kalā tu ṣoḍaśī matā /
GR14satvtanu:278: śatabhāgo vibhūtiś ca varṇyate kavibhiḥ pṛthak // SatvT_3.9
GR14satvtanu:280: yaśasaḥ pṛthagbhedaṃ mattaḥ śṛṇu dvijottama // SatvT_3.10
GR14satvtanu:282: eṣāṃ jñānaṃ vadanty aṅga jñānaṃ ṣaḍvidham uttamam // SatvT_3.11
GR14satvtanu:283: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā maunaṃ dharmaś cāturvidhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:284: amāno vyatirekaś ca aindriyas tu vaśīkṛtaḥ // SatvT_3.12
GR14satvtanu:286: aṇimā laghimā caiva mahimā tadanantaram // SatvT_3.13
GR14satvtanu:287: prākāmyaṃ caiva prāptiś ca īśitā vaśitā tathā /
GR14satvtanu:288: kāmasyāvasitā hy ete aṣṭaiśvaryāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // SatvT_3.14
GR14satvtanu:291: gṛhā bhūr astraśastre ca durgādyāḥ śriya īritāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:292: yaśas tu puṃso bhavati karmato guṇatas tathā // SatvT_3.16
GR14satvtanu:296: tathāpy ahaṃ dviṣaṣṭhīṃ te varṇayāmy anupūrvaśaḥ // SatvT_3.18
GR14satvtanu:297: brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca bhaktavātsalyam eva ca /
GR14satvtanu:301: śauryam audāryam āstikyaṃ sthairyaṃ dhairyaṃ prasannatā /
GR14satvtanu:302: gāmbhīryaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ prāgalbhyam ṛtamaṅgalam // SatvT_3.21
GR14satvtanu:303: śamo damo balaṃ dākṣyaṃ kṣemaṃ harṣo 'nahaṃkṛtiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:304: saṃtoṣa ārjavaṃ sāmyaṃ manobhāgyaṃ śrutaṃ sukham // SatvT_3.22
GR14satvtanu:305: tyāgo bhayaṃ pāvanaṃ ca tejaḥ kauśalam āśrayaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:306: dhṛtiḥ kṣamā smṛtir lajjā śraddhā maitrī dayonnatiḥ // SatvT_3.23
GR14satvtanu:307: śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ svavākśuddhir buddhir vidyā svarakṣatā /
GR14satvtanu:308: ete te bhagabhedās tu kathitā hy anupūrvaśaḥ // SatvT_3.24
GR14satvtanu:309: eṣāṃ prakāśo yatrāsīt sa pūrṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:310: aṃśaprakāśād aṃśaḥ syāt kalāyās tu kalā smṛtā // SatvT_3.25
GR14satvtanu:311: vibhūtes tu vibhūtiḥ syād eṣa bhedo na hi svataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:314: yataḥ kṛṣṇāvatāreṇa bhagabhedāḥ pṛthak pṛthak // SatvT_3.27
GR14satvtanu:317: darśitā bhagabhedā vai tasmād aṃśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:320: tathā śuklādayo hy āvirbhāvā ṛṣabha ātmavān // SatvT_3.30
GR14satvtanu:325: gayaḥ pṛthuś ca bharataḥ śaktiyuktāḥ kalā matāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:326: guṇāvatārā brahmādyās tadaṃśā ye vibhūtayaḥ // SatvT_3.33
GR14satvtanu:329: na brahmaṇo bhidā vipra śrīkṛṣṇasya ca sattama /
GR14satvtanu:330: nārāyaṇasya vā saumya hy avatārisvarūpiṇaḥ // SatvT_3.35
GR14satvtanu:333: kiṃ brahma paramaṃ sākṣāt kiṃ vā nārāyaṇo vibhuḥ // SatvT_3.36
GR14satvtanu:335: kim ekatattvam eteṣām athavā kiṃ pṛthak pṛthak // SatvT_3.37
GR14satvtanu:337: śṛṇu tat paramaṃ guhyaṃ brahmadāyāda sattama /
GR14satvtanu:338: avatārisvarūpaṃ me yathā varṇayato dvija // SatvT_3.39
GR14satvtanu:339: ekam eva paraṃ tattvam avatāri sanātanam /
GR14satvtanu:342: tathā śrīkṛṣṇadevasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca // SatvT_3.41
GR14satvtanu:344: śrīkṛṣṇākhyaṃ paraṃ dhāma paramānandam uttamam // SatvT_3.42
GR14satvtanu:348: vadanti brahma paramaṃ prakāśātmakam avyayam // SatvT_3.44
GR14satvtanu:354: anantaśaktiṃ sarveṣāṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param // SatvT_3.47
GR14satvtanu:357: ataḥ kṛṣṇasya devasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca /
GR14satvtanu:358: vastuto naiva bhedo hi varṇyate tair api dvija // SatvT_3.49
GR14satvtanu:360: tathā sa bhagavān kṛṣṇo nāneva paricakṣate // SatvT_3.50
GR14satvtanu:366: muktyādyarthaṃ nṛlokasya mānuṣatvaṃ yato gataḥ // SatvT_3.53
GR14satvtanu:367: atas taṃ puruṣā nityaṃ bhaktibhedena nityadā /
GR14satvtanu:368: bhajanti hy apavargeśaṃ pareśaṃ tadakāmyayā // SatvT_3.54
GR14satvtanu:369: mayā te kathitā vipra avatārā mahātmanaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:370: kim anyat kathayāmy adya tvaṃ hi bhāgavatottamaḥ // SatvT_3.55
GR14satvtanu:372: nāsti tṛptiḥ śṛṇvato me tava vāgamṛtaṃ hareḥ /
GR14satvtanu:374: tathāpi sāmprataṃ hy etac chrutvā kautūhalaṃ mama /
GR14satvtanu:375: bhaktibhedaṃ bhagavato bhāvanīyaṃ sadā nṛbhiḥ // SatvT_4.2
GR14satvtanu:376: brūhi me bhagavan viṣṇor bhaktibhedaṃ sadāśiva /
GR14satvtanu:377: yaj jñātvā hy añjasā viṣṇoḥ sāmyaṃ yāti janaḥ prabho // SatvT_4.3
GR14satvtanu:379: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sādho paraṃ guhyatamaṃ yataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:380: anyasmai na mayā proktaṃ vinā bhāgavatān narāt // SatvT_4.4
GR14satvtanu:381: yadaivāvocaṃ māṃ kṛṣṇo dhyānāt tuṣṭamanā vibhuḥ /
GR14satvtanu:383: tadā cāhaṃ tasya pādapaṅkaje śirasā nataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:384: babhāṣa etad bhagavān bhaktān nirdeṣṭum arhasi // SatvT_4.6
GR14satvtanu:385: tadā prītamanā devo mām uvāca satāṃ gatiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:386: śṛṇuṣva śiva bhadraṃ te bhaktān vakṣyāmi sātvatān // SatvT_4.7
GR14satvtanu:388: bhaktān jānīhi me deva sarvalokapraṇāmakān // SatvT_4.8
GR14satvtanu:390: bravīmi śiva te bhaktis tenaiva samprasidhyati // SatvT_4.9
GR14satvtanu:391: yadi tvadvākyaniṣṭhaḥ syād yo 'pi ko 'pi sadāśiva /
GR14satvtanu:392: tasmai prītamanā vācyo bhaktibhedaḥ sasādhanaḥ // SatvT_4.10
GR14satvtanu:393: tad idaṃ te pravakṣyāmi bhaktibhedaṃ sasādhanam /
GR14satvtanu:395: ekaiva bhaktiḥ śrīviṣṇoḥ prītir ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:397: kiṃ tu jñānakriyālīlābhedaiḥ sā trividhā matā /
GR14satvtanu:398: tān śṛṇuṣvānupūrvyeṇa mattaḥ svavahito dvija // SatvT_4.13
GR14satvtanu:400: sā nirguṇajñānamayī sākṣād api garīyasī // SatvT_4.14
GR14satvtanu:404: satsaṅgajānyāsād grāhyā sarvadā sā hy anuttamā // SatvT_4.16
GR14satvtanu:406: yām āśritya samāpnoti jano bhaktiṃ janārdane // SatvT_4.17
GR14satvtanu:412: sameṣu mitrabhāvena dīneṣu dayayā tathā // SatvT_4.20
GR14satvtanu:414: bhūteṣu bhagavaddṛṣṭyā nirguṇā bhaktir ucyate // SatvT_4.21
GR14satvtanu:415: labdhvā tāṃ nirguṇāṃ bhaktiṃ muktiṃ cāpi na manyate /
GR14satvtanu:418: yat sarvayatnataḥ kāryaṃ puruṣeṇa manīṣiṇā // SatvT_4.23
GR14satvtanu:421: vācoccāro harer nāmnāṃ karṇābhyāṃ karmaṇāṃ śrutiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:426: dṛṣṭvā viṣṇujanādīnām īkṣaṇaṃ sādareṇa ca // SatvT_4.27
GR14satvtanu:428: bāhupādādibhir viṣṇor vandanaṃ parayā mudā // SatvT_4.28
GR14satvtanu:431: āśu sampadyate bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe bhāgavatī satī /
GR14satvtanu:433: svābhāvikī ratir abhūt sā vai bhāgavatī matā /
GR14satvtanu:434: etadbhaktiparo vipra cāturvargyaṃ na manyate // SatvT_4.31
GR14satvtanu:435: tasyām antaḥ sarvasukham adhikaṃ vāpi labhyate /
GR14satvtanu:438: sadguror upadeśena labdhvā satsaṅgam ādṛtaḥ // SatvT_4.33
GR14satvtanu:440: teṣv evaṃ kīrtanaṃ teṣāṃ manasā cāpi cintanam // SatvT_4.34
GR14satvtanu:442: yady aśakto bhavet kīrtau smaraṇe cāpi sarvaśaḥ // SatvT_4.35
GR14satvtanu:443: tadā tu bhagavannāmnām āvṛttau vṛttayet sadā /
GR14satvtanu:444: sadā śaśvat prītiyukto yaḥ kuryād etad anvaham // SatvT_4.36
GR14satvtanu:445: tasyāśu bhaktiḥ śrīkṛṣṇe jāyate sadbhir ādṛtā /
GR14satvtanu:446: evaṃ premamayīṃ labdhvā bhittvā saṃsāram ātmanaḥ // SatvT_4.37
GR14satvtanu:449: nānusaṃdhatta etā vai vinā bhaktiṃ janārdane /
GR14satvtanu:450: yady anyasādhanāny anyabhaktau kuryād atantritaḥ // SatvT_4.39
GR14satvtanu:451: na tatra kaścid doṣaḥ syād dharisevā yataḥ kṛtā /
GR14satvtanu:452: kiṃ tu yad bhaktiniṣṭhā syāt tām evāpnoti mānavaḥ // SatvT_4.40
GR14satvtanu:453: phalabhedena bhedaḥ syāt sādhanena na bhidyate /
GR14satvtanu:454: pṛthag eṣa mayākhyāto bhaktibhedaḥ sasādhanaḥ // SatvT_4.41
GR14satvtanu:456: sakāmaḥ saguṇo vipra bahudhokto maharṣibhiḥ // SatvT_4.42
GR14satvtanu:457: kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy adya vada māṃ dvijasattama /
GR14satvtanu:459: vidheyaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā me surasattama /
GR14satvtanu:460: niṣedhanīyaṃ kiṃ cātra bhaktistambhakaraṃ ca yat // SatvT_4.43
GR14satvtanu:465: niṣedhanīyaṃ tat tāsāṃ bhaktānāṃ puruṣottame // SatvT_4.45
GR14satvtanu:469: bhaktighnadoṣaṃ śṛṇu taṃ sarvathā varjanaṃ nṛṇām // SatvT_4.47
GR14satvtanu:471: premamayyāṃ satāṃ dveṣo bhaktināśakarā ime // SatvT_4.48
GR14satvtanu:473: dveṣeṇa narakaṃ yāti kurvan bhaktim api dvijaḥ // SatvT_4.49
GR14satvtanu:474: doṣadṛṣṭyā doṣavān syāt tatra doṣaphalaṃ bhavet /
GR14satvtanu:475: martyadṛṣṭyā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ bhavet kuñjaraśaucavat // SatvT_4.50
GR14satvtanu:477: yayā bhaktir bhagavati hy añjasā syāt sukhāvahā // SatvT_4.51
GR14satvtanu:479: kāryā saiva tu tat sarvā bhagavadbhaktivardhinī // SatvT_4.52
GR14satvtanu:482: premamayyāṃ satāṃ prītyā śravaṇaṃ yaśasāṃ hareḥ /
GR14satvtanu:483: mukhyāḥ sādhanasampattyaḥ kathitās te dvijottama // SatvT_4.54
GR14satvtanu:485: yad vinā sravate bhaktir āmabhāṇḍāt payo yathā // SatvT_4.55
GR14satvtanu:488: vinā yena pumān yāti kurvan bhaktim api śramam // SatvT_4.56
GR14satvtanu:491: pariniṣṭhāśrayaṃ yad vai śaraṇaṃ parikīrtitam // SatvT_4.57
GR14satvtanu:492: etad vai trividhaṃ proktaṃ vedavidbhir dvijottama /
GR14satvtanu:493: prathamaṃ madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kramaśaḥ śṛṇu tan mune // SatvT_4.58
GR14satvtanu:495: yad buddhiniṣṭhitaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛtaṃ tat prathamaṃ smṛtam // SatvT_4.59
GR14satvtanu:497: yan mamatvāśrayaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛtaṃ tan madhyamaṃ smṛtam // SatvT_4.60
GR14satvtanu:499: tat sarvaṃ kṛṣṇapādābje kṛtaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prakīrtitam // SatvT_4.61
GR14satvtanu:500: īśvaraṃ tadadhīnaṃ ca taddharmaṃ ca sanātanam /
GR14satvtanu:501: hitvānyad āśrayaṃ tasya vastuto naiva dṛśyate // SatvT_4.62
GR14satvtanu:504: tasmād bhaktādṛter viṣṇor deho 'pi naiva satpriyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:507: bhaktānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sākṣād brūhi me surattama /
GR14satvtanu:508: tathaiva teṣv ahaṃ prītiṃ kariṣyāmi samāhitaḥ // SatvT_4.65
GR14satvtanu:510: bhaktānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sākṣād durvijñeyaṃ nṛbhir mune /
GR14satvtanu:511: vaiṣṇavair eva tad vedyaṃ padāny ahir aher iva // SatvT_4.66
GR14satvtanu:512: tathāpi sāratas teṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yad alaukikam /
GR14satvtanu:513: vakṣye tat te muniśreṣṭha viṣṇubhakto yato bhavān // SatvT_4.67
GR14satvtanu:516: yadā sarveṣu bhūteṣu hiṃsantam api kaṃcana /
GR14satvtanu:517: na hiṃsanti tadā muktā nirguṇā bhagavatparāḥ // SatvT_4.69
GR14satvtanu:518: harisevāṃ vinā kiṃcin manyante nātmanaḥ priyam /
GR14satvtanu:521: sadā saṃtuṣṭamanaso bhaktā bhāgavatā matāḥ // SatvT_4.71
GR14satvtanu:526: bhaktānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hy etat sāmānyena nirūpitam /
GR14satvtanu:527: idānīm ātmajijñāsyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu // SatvT_4.74
GR14satvtanu:528: sarvātmānaṃ hariṃ jñātvā sarveṣu prītimān naraḥ /
GR14satvtanu:529: sevāparo dveṣahīno janeṣu sa ca sattamaḥ // SatvT_4.75
GR14satvtanu:531: śreṣṭhamadhyamanīceṣu hy ātmanaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ // SatvT_4.76
GR14satvtanu:532: pratimādiṣv eva harau prītimān na tu sarvage /

GR14satvtanu:1257: sāpi kṛṣṇārcanāt paścāt kriyeta hṛdi taṃ smaran // SatvT_8.6
GR14satvtanu:1258: anyadā tv anyadevānāṃ pṛthakpūjāṃ na ca smaret /
GR14satvtanu:1259: kāmyaṃ niṣiddhaṃ ca tathā naiva kuryāt kadācana // SatvT_8.7
GR14satvtanu:1261: harikīrtiratā ye ca teṣāṃ kṛtyaṃ na vidyate // SatvT_8.8
GR14satvtanu:1263: bhaktibhraṣṭo bhaved āśu saṃsārān na nivartate // SatvT_8.9
GR14satvtanu:1266: yajñe paśor ālabhane naiva doṣo 'sti yad vacaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1267: api pravṛttī rāgiṇāṃ nivṛttis tu garīyasī // SatvT_8.11
GR14satvtanu:1269: yadi te svargatiṃ yānti narakaṃ yānti ke tadā // SatvT_8.12
GR14satvtanu:1270: sa māṃ punar bhakṣayitā yasya māṃsam adāmy aham /
GR14satvtanu:1271: iti māṃsaniruktaṃ vai varṇayanti manīṣiṇaḥ // SatvT_8.13
GR14satvtanu:1274: mānuṣyaṃ prāpya ye jīvā na bhajanti hareḥ padam /
GR14satvtanu:1275: te śocyā sthāvarādīnām apy ekaśaraṇā yadi // SatvT_8.15
GR14satvtanu:1276: ahaṃ brahmā surendrāś ca ye bhajāmo divāniśam /
GR14satvtanu:1277: tato 'dhiko 'sti ko devaḥ śrīkṛṣṇāt puruṣottamāt // SatvT_8.16
GR14satvtanu:1279: sāpi lakṣmīr yac caraṇaṃ sevate tadanādṛtā // SatvT_8.17
GR14satvtanu:1281: yan nāmni ke na saṃyānti puruṣāḥ paramaṃ padam // SatvT_8.18
GR14satvtanu:1283: tato 'dhiko 'sti ko devaḥ kṛpāsindhor mahātmanaḥ // SatvT_8.19
GR14satvtanu:1285: tato 'dhiko 'sti ko devaḥ sukhārādhyāj jagadguroḥ // SatvT_8.20
GR14satvtanu:1286: yena kenāpi bhāvena yo 'pi ko 'pi bhajan janaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1287: labhate 'bhīpsitāṃ siddhiṃ mokṣaṃ cāpy akutobhayam // SatvT_8.21
GR14satvtanu:1289: yo jaganmuktaye kīrtim avatīrya tatāna ha // SatvT_8.22
GR14satvtanu:1293: uccārayen mukhenaiva nāma cittena saṃsmaret // SatvT_8.24
GR14satvtanu:1295: daivopalabdhaṃ bhuñjāno nātiyatnaṃ caret sukhe // SatvT_8.25
GR14satvtanu:1296: gṛheṣv atithivat tiṣṭhed yady etān naiva bādhate /
GR14satvtanu:1297: eṣāṃ bādhe pṛthak tiṣṭhed vaiṣṇaveṣu ca saṅgavān // SatvT_8.26
GR14satvtanu:1298: brahmacārī gṛhī vāpi vānaprastho yatiś ca vā /
GR14satvtanu:1299: vinā vaiṣṇavasaṅgena naiva siddhiṃ labhej janaḥ // SatvT_8.27
GR14satvtanu:1300: bhaktasaṅgaṃ vinā bhaktir naiva jāyeta kasyacit /
GR14satvtanu:1301: bhaktiṃ vinā na vairāgyaṃ na jñānaṃ mokṣam aśnute // SatvT_8.28
GR14satvtanu:1302: ata āśramaliṅgāṃś ca hitvā bhakteḥ samaṃ vaset /
GR14satvtanu:1303: yatsaṅgāc chrutikīrtibhyāṃ harau bhaktiḥ prajāyate // SatvT_8.29
GR14satvtanu:1305: svargāpavargau na sāmyaṃ kim utānyasukhādibhiḥ // SatvT_8.30
GR14satvtanu:1306: ato yatnena puruṣaḥ kuryāt saṅgaṃ harer janaiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1307: tiryañco 'pi yato muktiṃ labhante kimu mānuṣāḥ // SatvT_8.31
GR14satvtanu:1309: vinā vairāgyajñānābhyāṃ yato viṣṇus tadantike // SatvT_8.32
GR14satvtanu:1310: yeṣāṃ saṅgāddhareḥ saṅgaṃ sakṛd ākarṇya mānavaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1311: parityaktuṃ na śaknoti yadi bhadrasarid bhavet // SatvT_8.33
GR14satvtanu:1313: bhūtvā rasajño 'pi mahān karmabandhād vimucyate // SatvT_8.34
GR14satvtanu:1316: bhaktiṃ viditvā puruṣo muktiṃ necchati kaścana /
GR14satvtanu:1317: sālokyādipadaṃ cāpi kimu cānyasukhaṃ dvija // SatvT_8.36
GR14satvtanu:1318: phalaṃ vinā viṣṇubhaktā muktiṃ yānti dvijottama /
GR14satvtanu:1319: tata eva vidur nānya ānandamayam uttamam // SatvT_8.37
GR14satvtanu:1320: yato harir likhitavat hṛdaye vartate sadā /
GR14satvtanu:1324: kuto bhajanti manujo anyadevaṃ kim icchayā // SatvT_9.1
GR14satvtanu:1327: na yajanti vinā viṣṇum anyadevaṃ kathaṃcana // SatvT_9.2
GR14satvtanu:1330: tadā tuṣṭo vibhuḥ prāha devadevo rameśvaraḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1331: avatīrya yajiṣyāmi yuṣmāṃl lokāṃś ca yājayan // SatvT_9.4
GR14satvtanu:1332: tataḥ sarve janā yuṣmān yajiṣyanti samāhitāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1333: anena pūjā yuṣmākaṃ bhaviṣyati sukhāvahā // SatvT_9.5
GR14satvtanu:1334: ahaṃ coktaḥ pṛthak tena śrīnivāsena brāhmaṇa /
GR14satvtanu:1335: kalpitair āgamair nityaṃ māṃ gopāya maheśvara // SatvT_9.6
GR14satvtanu:1337: paṭhiṣyasi sadā bhadraṃ prārthitena mayā punaḥ // SatvT_9.7
GR14satvtanu:1338: tato me hy āgamaiḥ kṛṣṇam ācchādya na tu devatāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1339: yantrair mantraiś ca tantraiś ca darśitāḥ phaladā dvija // SatvT_9.8
GR14satvtanu:1340: tair āgamair mandadhiyā hitvā kṛṣṇaṃ jagadgurum /
GR14satvtanu:1341: bhajanti devatā anyā balidānena nityaśaḥ // SatvT_9.9
GR14satvtanu:1343: bhogāvasāne te yānti narakaṃ svatamomayam // SatvT_9.10
GR14satvtanu:1345: gato 'haṃ vāsudevasya caraṇe śaraṇaṃ dvija // SatvT_9.11
GR14satvtanu:1350: eko 'si sṛṣṭeḥ purato laye tathā yugādikāle ca vidāṃ samakṣataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1351: anyatra nānātanubhir virājate tasmā anantācaritāya te namaḥ // SatvT_9.14
GR14satvtanu:1353: kṛṣṇāya nānātanum īyuṣe same kṛtānurāgāya namo namas te // SatvT_9.15
GR14satvtanu:1354: śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti ye yaśo jagatpavitraṃ jagadīśitus tava /
GR14satvtanu:1355: te 'nyaṃ na paśyanti sukhāya hy ātmano vinā bhavatpādaniṣevaṇād bahiḥ //
GR14satvtanu:1356: niṣkiṃcanā ye tava pādasaṃśrayāḥ puṣṇanti te tat sukham ātmasambhavam /
GR14satvtanu:1357: jānanti tattvena vidus tataḥ parāḥ kāmaiḥ samākṛṣṭadhiyo vicakṣaṇāḥ //
GR14satvtanu:1358: ahaṃ tu sākṣāt tava pādapaṅkajaṃ nityaṃ bhajāno 'pi pṛthaṅmatir vibho /
GR14satvtanu:1359: purātmamānaṃ pracikīrṣur ātmanaḥ sakāśato 'py adya malaṃ nikṛntayan //
GR14satvtanu:1360: athāpi te deva padāmbujadvayaṃ nikāmalābhāya sadāstu me hareḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1361: yac cintanāt sarvamano'nukūlāt siddhir bhavaty eva kimu prakīrtanāt //
GR14satvtanu:1362: iti me saṃstutiṃ jñātvā bhagavān praṇatārtihā /
GR14satvtanu:1363: mamākṣigocaraṃ rūpam akarot sa dayāparaḥ // SatvT_9.20
GR14satvtanu:1365: mañjīrair vilasatpiśaṅgavalayaṃ lakṣmyāṅkitaṃ śāśvatam sarveśaṃ karuṇākaraṃ suravarair bhaktaiḥ samāsevitam // SatvT_9.21
GR14satvtanu:1366: dṛṣṭvā tatpadapaṅkajaṃ hṛdi dadhe govindadāmodaraśrīkṛṣṇeti mukhair vadan trijagato bhartur mudāhaṃ tadā /
GR14satvtanu:1367: netrair nirjharavāripūram iva me gātre ca harṣas tato vāṇyāṃ gadgadatāṃ vilokya bhagavān mām āha bhaktapriyaḥ // SatvT_9.22
GR14satvtanu:1368: jñatāṃ me suravarya vāñchitatarāṃ madbhaktasaṅgāvaliṃ tat te 'haṃ
GR14satvtanu:1369: pravadāmi te karuṇayā bhaktāya sākaṃ varaiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1370: mallīlāṃ gadato bhaviṣyati bhavatsarve janā vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1371: bhāryā cāpi tayānukūlasukhadā bhaktāgraṇīr me bhavān // SatvT_9.23
GR14satvtanu:1372: etāvad uktvā bhagavān gato lokam alaukikam /
GR14satvtanu:1373: ahaṃ ca tān varāṃl labdhvā kṛtārtho 'smi dvijarṣabha // SatvT_9.24
GR14satvtanu:1374: atas tad dinam ārabhya pārvatī bhuvaneśvarī /
GR14satvtanu:1375: matsaṅgād vaiṣṇavī bhūtvā mām āpṛcchat sureśvarī // SatvT_9.25
GR14satvtanu:1377: kuberādyā devatāś ca nandīśādyāś ca me gaṇāḥ // SatvT_9.26
GR14satvtanu:1380: atha māṃ pṛcchatī vākyaṃ madvākyaṃ ca dvijottama /
GR14satvtanu:1382: mama teṣāṃ ca saṃvādaṃ kalā lokamanoharāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1383: abhavaṃs tatra śāstrāṇi sarvalokahitāni vai // SatvT_9.29
GR14satvtanu:1385: sthāne sthāne muniśreṣṭha kathayiṣyanti bhūriśaḥ // SatvT_9.30
GR14satvtanu:1386: tvam apy enaṃ sātvatākhyaṃ tantraṃ bhagavataḥ priyam /
GR14satvtanu:1389: śrutaṃ bhagavato vaktrāt tantraṃ sātvatam uttamam /
GR14satvtanu:1390: tasmin hiṃsāniṣedhaṃ ca śrutvā me saṃśayo 'bhavat // SatvT_9.32
GR14satvtanu:1392: yajñe vadho 'vadhaś caiva vedavidbhir nirūpitaḥ // SatvT_9.33
GR14satvtanu:1393: tanniṣedhe kathaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ karma maheśvara /
GR14satvtanu:1396: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karma varṇitam /
GR14satvtanu:1397: śrutyā smṛtyā ca viprendra kāmyaṃ kāmijanāya vai // SatvT_9.35
GR14satvtanu:1398: pravṛttam avirodhena kurvan svar yāti mānavaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1401: prayāti paramāṃ siddhiṃ yato nāvartate gataḥ // SatvT_9.37
GR14satvtanu:1404: vidhir naivāsti hiṃsāyām abhyanujñā yataḥ kṛtā /
GR14satvtanu:1405: ato nivṛttihiṃsāyāṃ yajñe 'pi kathitā budhaiḥ // SatvT_9.39
GR14satvtanu:1407: sa ca ācārato nṇām abhīṣṭaphalado bhavet // SatvT_9.40
GR14satvtanu:1409: ahiṃsayā hi bhūtānāṃ bhagavān āśu tuṣyati // SatvT_9.41
GR14satvtanu:1412: mayāpi hy āgame hiṃsā vihitā yā vidhānataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:1414: viṣṇubhaktā na vāñchanti matto 'pi kiyad eva hi /
GR14satvtanu:1415: atas teṣāṃ vidhāne 'pi hiṃsā nindyā prakīrtitā // SatvT_9.43
GR14satvtanu:1418: pravṛttaśāstraṃ śṛṇuyād yac chrutvā tatparo bhavet /
GR14satvtanu:1419: nivṛtte 'pi harer bhaktiyutaṃ mukhyaṃ prakīrtitam // SatvT_9.45
GR14satvtanu:1421: kīrtayasva dvijaśreṣṭha śrūyāś caiva nirantaram // SatvT_9.46
GR14satvtanu:1423: ye bhajanti hareḥ pādaṃ kṛṣṇaikaśaraṇaṃ narāḥ // SatvT_9.47
GR14satvtanu:1427: yajanty avirataṃ devān paśūn hatvā sukhecchayā // SatvT_9.49
GR14satvtanu:1429: ity etat kathitaṃ vipra tantraṃ sātvatam uttamam // SatvT_9.50
GR14satvtanu:1431: śravaṇāt kīrtanād asya kṛṣṇe bhaktir hi jāyate // SatvT_9.51
GR14satvtanu:1432: bhaktiṃ labdhavataḥ sādho kim anyad avaśiṣyate /
GR14satvtanu:1433: yato bhagavatā proktaṃ tasya bhaktivivardhanam // SatvT_9.52
GR14satvtanu:1435: avatārāś ca śrīviṣṇoḥ sampūrṇāṃśakalā bhidā // SatvT_9.53
GR14satvtanu:1436: bhaktibhedāś ca bhedānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham /
GR14satvtanu:1439: viṣṇor nāmnā vaiṣṇavānām aparādhasya ca niṣkṛtiḥ // SatvT_9.55
GR14satvtanu:1442: yan nāmaikaṃ karṇamūlaṃ praviṣṭaṃ vācānviṣṭaṃ cetanāsu smṛtaṃ vā /
GR14satvtanu:1443: dagdhvā pāpaṃ śuddhasattvāt taddehaṃ kṛtvā sākṣāt saṃvidhatte 'navadyam /
GR14satvtanu:1445: mahānubhāvāya nirañjanāya nityātmalābhāya namo namas te // SatvT_9.57
